title: Council Decision of 10 October 1994 appointing two members and one alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 10 October 1994 appointing two members and one alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training (94/C 294/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed member and alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training until 24 July 1997:
Experts from the medical faculties of the universities>TABLE>

Mrs Claude VIATTE is hereby appointed member in the category of experts from the competent authorities of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training to replace Mr Philippe EVEN for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 24 July 1997.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 10 October 1994.
For the Council
The President
Th. WAIGEL
(1) OJ No L 167, 30. 6. 1975, p. 17.
(2) OJ No C 221, 9. 8. 1994, p. 1.
